mods.abstract: Male child, composition head on cloth body, wire arms, felt hands, dark brown wig, molded and painted features, grey felt hat, white shirt with standing collar, black bow tie, grey vest with two golden buttons, brown trousers, blue long jacket has lapel, two golden buttons. Slit at back, all felt except bow tie, all, machine-made: company label, AUSTRIAN, TYROLIAN, Helga, DOLLS AND TOYS. Accompanying information describes that this Austrian boy doll is made by Compana Helga in Austria. English influence in design. Bought in London, 1957.""
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
